description.text: Swim, jump, dig, and build your way to victory.  Two Cubes and a Base.

ru.original: Swim, jump, dig, and build your way to victory.  Two Cubes and a Base.
ru.translation: Прыгай, ныряй, строй, побеждай. Два куба и база.

es.original: Swim, jump, dig, and build your way to victory.  Two Cubes and a Base.
es.translation:
Cava más, salta más, construye más y... nada más.
Dos generadores y un núcleo.

de.original: Swim, jump, dig, and build your way to victory.  Two Cubes and a Base.
de.translation: Schwimmt, springt, baut und buddelt euch zum Sieg. Zwei Generatoren und eine Basis.

pt.original: Swim, jump, dig, and build your way to victory.  Two Cubes and a Base.
pt.translation: Nade, pule, cave e construa para sair vitorioso. Dois Cubos e uma Base.

fr.original: Swim, jump, dig, and build your way to victory.  Two Cubes and a Base.
fr.translation: Tous à l’eau pour rafler la victoire ! Deux cubes et une base.
